question: Which protein family is epiregulin a member of?
ideal_answer: EREG (epiregulin), a member of the epidermal growth factor (EGF) family.

snippets.text: EREG (epiregulin), a member of the epidermal growth factor (EGF) family, plays a role in inflammation, wound healing, normal physiology and malignancies. However, little is known about its function on hair growth.
